name: PIM_Diabetes_Testing_Supplies
title: PIM_Diabetes_Testing_Supplies
purpose: (Clinical Focus: List of HCPCS codes for diabetes testing supplies),(Data Element Scope: Diabetic testing supplies),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes glucose monitors, lancets, needles, disinfectant wipes.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
